heisigStory: To refer to the fullness of humanity that can only be achieved in dialogue with another (person . . . two), Confucius used this character.
koohiiStory1: The beginning of humanity required at least TWO people. Mr. T and Mrs. T!
koohiiStory2: Mr. T shows his humanity by giving two bucks to every homeless person he sees.
readingExamples: 仁義 (じんぎ), 仁術 (ひとしじゅつ)
